original_text: The Jewish leaders will deliver me to people that are not Jews. They will laugh at me. They will say bad things against me. They will spit at me.
korean_text: 인자가 이방인들에게 넘겨져 희롱을 당하고 능욕을 당하고 침 뱉음을 당하겠으며

sentences.original_text: The Jewish leaders will deliver me
to people that are not Jews
They will say bad things against me
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 나를 헐뜯는 말을 할 것입니다
